text: actually, we can use service workers (possibly in combination with web workers) as a secure keystore, extensions don't have access to this

Consider that I'm a user who wishes to remain anonymous, I have made 3 popular posts, so my balance reports a 50mBTC balance. How can I withdraw bitcoins without revealing that I was the author of those 3 posts? A single withdrawal wouldn't suffice, but 3 separate transactions to different Bitcoin addresses is cumbersome. <@U07GDL0H5> can fullnode support CoinJoin?

<@U08ERPTQF>: privacy has been a personal interest of mine for a long time. fullnode has partial support for stealth addresses. it does not support coinjoin, but that is something we could add at the right time.
i don't think coinjoin should be a part of MVP, but it should be on the list of features to be added at an appropriate time.
Stealth addresses will be good. Agree CoinJoin isn't needed for MVP :)
